short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: take a screenshot every page load for select websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cmdr's Log automatically takes screenshots whenever you refresh on certain domains. You choose the domains in the extension to help you track progress on that domain.

You can set a delay in milliseconds to wait after page loads before taking the screenshot.

Setting a domain like localhost:8000 lets you collect images worthy of a timelapse for whatever projects you are working on.

It's easy to forget what things looked like when you just got started, this helps you remember.

still under heavy development: 
https://github.com/enjalot/cmdrslog
More thoughts:
